text: ## U. SPLIT / CONSOLIDATION OF EQUITY SHARES
Our Company has not undertaken any split or consolidation of its equity shares in the one year preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
## V. EXEMPTION FROM COMPLYING WITH ANY PROVISIONS OF SECURITIES LAW, IF ANY, GRANTED BY SEBI
Our Company has not received any exemption from SEBI from complying with any provisions of securities laws, as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
